q_ch: 主仓库和辅助仓库中，哪个仓库的Cotton Fabric更多？
q_en: Which warehouse has more Cotton Fabric between the main and auxiliary warehouses?
gt:
Sure thing! Let's dive into the details and find out which warehouse has more Cotton Fabric. 🏢

Here's what we have:

| Warehouse Name       | Cotton Fabric Quantity |
|----------------------|------------------------|
| Main Warehouse       | 3400                   |
| Auxiliary Warehouse  | Not available          |

It looks like we only have data for the Main Warehouse, which has 3400 units of Cotton Fabric. Unfortunately, we don't have the quantity for the Auxiliary Warehouse. Based on the available information, the Main Warehouse has more Cotton Fabric. 🎉

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask! 😊

steps.sql: SELECT id, name FROM warehouse WHERE name IN ('Main Warehouse', 'Auxiliary Warehouse');
steps.description: Retrieve the warehouse IDs for "Main Warehouse" and "Auxiliary Warehouse"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM materials WHERE name = 'Cotton Fabric';
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID for "Cotton Fabric"

steps.sql: SELECT wm.warehouse_id, wm.left_number FROM warehouse_material wm WHERE wm.material_id = '1' AND wm.warehouse_id IN ('1', '2');
steps.description: Retrieve the remaining quantity of "Cotton Fabric" in both "Main Warehouse" and "Auxiliary Warehouse"
